โฆ๏ธโฆ๏ธโ๏ธAli Larijani exposes the true face of the Islamic Republic to the World โ Especially to Europeans.

โ๏ธHe indirectly threatens @rafaelmgrossi with assassination โ the very kind of veiled threat that mirrors what happened to former European Parliament Vice President Alejo Vidal Quadras in Madrid, where the Islamic Republic was behind the attempted assassination.

Larijani has revealed the true nature of the Islamic Republic to the international community, particularly to European actors currently negotiating shady deals with the regime.

Larijani has indirectly threatened Rafael Grossi, the Director General of the @iaeaorg, with assassination.

(As someone who personally survived an assassination attempt by the Islamic Republic last year, I recognize these kinds of veiled threats all too well โ phrased without explicitly mentioning murder, but clearly conveying: "We'll settle the score with you," and similar language.)

Larijani is a senior advisor to Ali Khamenei, a permanent member of the Expediency Council, a member of the Supreme Council of the Cultural Revolution, former president of IR Parliament, and a former member of the #IRGCterorrists
